roadmap.title: Basic Beatmap Display
roadmap.description: Display basic beatmap information with cover art and metadata

roadmap.title: Beatmap Search & Filtering
roadmap.description: Implement search functionality and filtering options for beatmaps

roadmap.title: Advanced Filtering
roadmap.description: Add advanced filtering options including difficulty range.

roadmap.title: Beatmap Download System
roadmap.description: Add direct beatmap download functionality using catboy mirror

roadmap.title: Add Back Beatmap Visualizer
roadmap.description: Add a beatmap visualizer to the beatmap page

roadmap.title: Score Submission System
roadmap.description: Add a score submission system with a leaderboard for unranked bancho beatmaps

roadmap.title: Popular skin sharing system
roadmap.description: Add a popular skin sharing system

roadmap.title: Tools sharing system
roadmap.description: Add a way to share tools

roadmap.title: Etterna pack to Osu! pack converter
roadmap.description: Add a way to convert Etterna packs to Osu! packs

roadmap.title: Rank unsubmitted beatmaps (etterna map or removed beatmap)
roadmap.description: Add a way to rank unsubmitted beatmaps (etterna map or removed beatmap)
